ARABIC: فَوَسْوَسَ إِلَيْهِ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ قَالَ يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلْ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلْخُلْدِ وَمُلْكٍ لَّا يَبْلَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But Shaytan whispered to him, saying, 'Adam, shall I show you the way to the Tree of Everlasting Life and to a kingdom which will never fade away?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But then Satan tempted him by saying: "O Adam, should I show you the tree of immortality, and a kingdom that will never know any wane?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But Satan seduced him, saying: "Adam! Shall I direct you to a tree of eternal life and an abiding kingdom?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Satan, trying to seduce him, said, "Adam, do you want me to show you the Tree of Eternity and the Everlasting Kingdom?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So the devil incited him, saying, “O Adam, shall I show you the tree of immortality and a kingdom that does not erode?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then Shaytan whispered to him, saying: "O Adam! Shall I lead you to the Tree of Eternity and to a kingdom that will never waste away"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But the Shaitan made an evil suggestion to him; he said: O Adam! Shall I guide you to the tree of immortality and a kingdom which decays not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then Satan whispered to him saying, 'Adam, shall I point thee to the Tree of Eternity, and a Kingdom that decays not?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But the devil whispered to him, saying: O Adam! Shall I show thee the tree of immortality and power that wasteth not away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But Satan whispered evil to him, saying, "Adam, shall I lead you to the tree of immortality and to a kingdom that never declines?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then the Satan whispered unto him; he said: Adam! shall direct thee to the tree of eternity and a dominion that ageth not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then Satan tempted him. He said, ‘O Adam! Shall I show you the tree of immortality, and an imperishable kingdom?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But Satan whispered evil to him: he said, "O Adam! shall I lead thee to the Tree of Eternity and to a kingdom that never decays?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then Shaitan (Satan) whispered to him, saying: "O Adam! Shall I lead you to the Tree of Eternity and to a kingdom that will never waste away?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But satan whispered to him saying: 'Adam, shall I direct you the Tree of Eternity and a kingdom which never decays'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But Satan whispered to him. He said, “O Adam, shall I show you the Tree of Immortality, and a kingdom that never decays?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:120] Then Satan whispered to him saying, ‘O Adam, shall I guide you to the Tree of Immortality, which gives everlasting life to the one who eats thereof, and a kingdom that does not waste away?’, that does not perish while he remains immortal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But the Devil whispered to him) to eat of the tree, (saying: O Adam! Shall I show thee the tree of immortality) whoever eats from it will live for ever and shall never die (and power that wasteth not away) and will remain holding on to a power that will never cease?
